amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in House Report 118-142 to require a study and report on health conditions arising in members of the Armed Forces after the administration of the COVID-19 vaccine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Davidson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
